I find that music helps me relax and focus on my studies.
i want a dog , but that is a lot of commitment.
i am planning a trip to europe.

participant_2.background:
I can't eat ice cream, but I'll dress up in a costume to celebrate Halloween with my family.
I don't exercise often because I have a lot of other things going on in my life.
I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
i am canadian.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. I have a lot of work to do but I'm trying to procrastinate.
I feel that! I'm just getting ready to go to the library to study. I'm planning a trip to Europe and I need to do some research.
That sounds exciting! I've always wanted to go to Europe. What countries are you planning on visiting?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about starting in Ireland and then going to England, France, and Italy.
That sounds like a great trip! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
I can imagine! I love to travel.
Me too! I think it's one of the best ways to learn about different cultures and meet new people.
I agree! What's your favorite place you've ever traveled to?
That's a tough question! I have so many amazing travel experiences. I think I'd have to say my favorite place was Thailand. The people were so friendly and the food was amazing!
That sounds amazing! I've never been to Thailand but it's definitely on my list.
You should definitely go! It's such a beautiful country.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to help people plan their trips.
You're a lifesaver! I'm so glad I met you.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
